posts.post_content:
I have this in one of my EDH decks. The best I've done so far was [Doubling Season](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Doubling Season), [Parallel Lives](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Parallel Lives), sitting at 120 life. I cast this, and gained 480 Pegasus tokens :-)   
  
The game got really crazy then. Two opponents went, couldn't find a way to kill my guys. Guy before me thinks he's all powerful when he drops [All is Dust](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=All is Dust). Thanks to [Leyline of Anticipation](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Leyline of Anticipation), I drop [Altar of Dementia](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name= Altar of Dementia) and milled them all to death :-)
posts.html:
I have this in one of my EDH decks. The best I've done so far was Doubling Season, Parallel Lives, sitting at 120 life. I cast this, and gained 480 Pegasus tokens :-)

The game got really crazy then. Two opponents went, couldn't find a way to kill my guys. Guy before me thinks he's all powerful when he drops All is Dust. Thanks to Leyline of Anticipation, I drop Altar of Dementia and milled them all to death :-)
